content:
As a result of the shelling of Russia, the village of Mikhailovka, Kherson region, was killed by a local resident.

About thisreportedHead of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin.

According to him, Russian invaders hit the drone-Kamikadze on an apartment building in the village of Mikhailivka of Beryslav district.

“A 61-year-old resident was fatal in her own home. My condolences to my family, ”said Alexander Proudin.

As reported by the Armyinform, the enemy continuesAttach the civilian population of Kherson region: There are wounded.
title: In Mikhailivka, a woman was killed as a result of a shock drone attack
description: This was reported by the head of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin. According to him, ...
author: Army Inform
